PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Assasin is not beginner-friendly, you need to have experience, because we will get stunned, difficult mana sustain, and doesn't have as much ES compared to trickster(pretty bad def). So, good positioning is highly needed and spend your mana wisely, don't overspam.
I changed to assasin just to try out if it's possible on my 'one-shot' unleash concept...and it works!
So, just a reminder, if you wanna be a glass canon and go FULL saiyan DPS, then go assasin(maybe u can invest more on def with better gear tho)
But i would highly recommend Trickster instead, the damage isn't bad, just couldnt one-shot guardians. And i would say trickster with MoM is pretty much HC viable. the def is crazy good. Mana sustain is awesome as well with Weave of the Arcane, if you happened to run out of mana and urgently needed some mana for MoM, jus spam ur lightning warp :)
..................
// Unique Gear // (Cheaper version) - Cloak of defiance (easy Mana + MoM) - Voidbringer gloves (Mana cost = DAMAGE AF) - Essence worm (to reserve wrath = damage boost) - Atziri's foible amulet (easy Mana + mana regen)
(End game version) - Cloak of defiance (easy Mana + MoM) - Voidbringer gloves (Mana cost = DAMAGE AF) - Aul (Wrath) - so that you can change ur ring to a yellow with more LIFE + mana + damage/resist) - Get a wrath watcher (penetration is the best) - Cinderswallow (for the %mana gained on kill = good sustain)
*Basically jus changed the amulet for end game version,but even with atziri's foible , it actually has more or less the same damage~ and with better mana regen (highly recommend for beginners)
Conclusion : This build can be achieved easily, just get these required uniques and stack more mana, and you're good to go!
................
// Playstyle // "So how do you sustain that huge mana cost?" Good question. And this is the most important part for this build. We can't simply spam (it basically eats up 60% of mana), so use it wisely such as aiming at huge pack of mobs, then pop cinderswallow flask, kills everything and gets full mana back on. As for trickster, like i said, spam lightning warp to trigger wave of the arcane and get back full mana.
As for bossing, 1. Pop arcane cloak (eats up 60% of mana) 2. Use mana flask to regen 3. Pop Vaal RF 4. Cast spell totem(wave of conviction) 5. Cast Storm brand(curse on hit) 6. Unleash your 5 seals on the boss 7. Boss ded 8. If the boss left some life 9. Vaal ARC 10. Next
